title: Inspection: Dead rodents and fruit flies 'too numerous to count' found at Waterworks Cinema
text: Inspection: Dead rodents and fruit flies 'too numerous to count' found at Waterworks Cinema Inspection: Dead rodents and fruit flies 'too numerous to count' found at Waterworks Cinema WASHINGTON. I’M LILY COLEMAN FOR PITTSBURGH’S ACTION NEWS FOUR. ALL RIGHT. THANK YOU. LILY AND NEW THIS AFTERNOON A HEALTH ALERT AT A LOCAL MOVIE THEATER AND INSPECTION THIS WEEK AT THE WATERWORKS CINEMA SHOWED EVIDENCE OF RODENT INFEST MATSON. THAT INSPECTION ALSO UNCOVERED FRUIT FLIES TOO NUMEROUS TO COUNT, AND ALSO FOUND SOME H Advertisement Inspection: Dead rodents and fruit flies 'too numerous to count' found at Waterworks Cinema An inspection by the Allegheny County Health Department found evidence of rodent infestation at the Waterworks Cinema. The inspection also uncovered fruit flies that the report says were "too numerous to count."The report also says inspectors found hot dogs were kept at unsafe temperatures. Read the full report here An inspection by the Allegheny County Health Department found evidence of rodent infestation at the Waterworks Cinema. The inspection also uncovered fruit flies that the report says were "too numerous to count." Advertisement The report also says inspectors found hot dogs were kept at unsafe temperatures.
